va-home-loan-program-for-survivors.title: Home Loan Program for Survivors
va-home-loan-program-for-survivors.summa: A VA-backed home loan may be available to the surviving spouse of a veteran.
va-home-loan-program-for-survivors.eligi: The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service.
discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
died as a result of a service-connected disability or illness,
died while receiving or traveling to receive VA care,
died while eligible or receiving VA compensation,
